table: Gain on sale of businesses and non-current assets

context: In 2019 we recognized other income, net of expenses, of $103 million, increasing compared to $53 million in 2018, mainly benefitting from the grants associated with the programs part of the European Commission IPCEI in Italy and in France, partially offset by a higher level of start-up costs associated with the production ramp up of the 200 mm fab recently acquired from Micron Technology Inc. in Singapore. In 2018 we recognized other income, net of expenses, of $53 million, slightly decreasing compared to $55 million in 2017, mainly due to lower level of R&D grants.
questions: What led to increase in other income, net of expenses in 2019?
What led to decrease in other income, net of expenses in 2018?
What was the other income, net of expenses in 2017?
What is the average Research and development funding?
What is the average gain on sale of businesses and non-current assets?
What is the increase/ (decrease) in Research and development funding from 2017 to 2019?
